CommandTranslatorRule:
This rule catches calls to the "clear" command, that erase portion of the image within a ROI. It applies to a given ImageProcessor.
# Get current ImagePlus image = WindowManager.getCurrentImage() # Get current ImageProcessor (i.e. the current displayed slice) ip = image.getProcessor() # To clear, set current color as background one (set in the ImageJ toolbar) ip.setColor(Toolbar.getBackgroundColor()) # Erase current selection ip.fill() # Restore foreground color ip.setColor(Toolbar.getForegroundColor()) # Refresh display image.updateAndDraw()
